items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Implement a real-time text messaging feature allowing users to send and receive messages instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Messages sent by a user appear on recipient's chat window within 1 second.
Messages are displayed in chronological order with timestamps.
Unread messages are clearly indicated until viewed.
dependencies: WebSocket or similar real-time communication protocol
non_functional: System should handle at least 10,000 concurrent users with <1s latency.
Messages must be encrypted in transit.

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Enable one-to-one video calls between users with real-time audio and video streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls from their contact list.
Video and audio quality remain stable with network latency up to 200ms.
Call connection time is less than 3 seconds.
non_functional: Video calls must be encrypted end-to-end.
Support for at least 720p video resolution.

notes: No actionable feedback was provided ('cghfghfhn'), so the JSON remains unchanged from the previous version.
